wikipedia_page.main: Janet Barnes,  is a British curator and former museum director. She was the chief executive officer of York Museums Trust from its founding in 2002 to 2015.

response: *In 2015 Janet Barnes, the founding Chief Executive of YMT retired. Reyahn King was appointed as her successor.
* Dr Janet Barnes, Chief Executive, York Museums Trust. For services to Museums in Yorkshire.
King was appointed as chief executive of York Museums Trust in November 2015. She is only the second CEO of the Trust, following Janet Barnes who had held the role from its inception in 2002.
